_comment: All these options can be overwritten using command line option parsing.

COOLAN._comment: Empty below field if you dont have a coolan account.

WAVE._commentApp: appName = your app name, if emply users Wave Private App will be used.|(leave blank for defaul)
WAVE._commentDatasetName: datasetName = Dataset name must be unique acsross organization.|(leave blank for defaul)
WAVE._commentDatasetLable: datasetLable = Dataset Lable usuallay a display name, need not to be unique.|(leave blank for defaul)

CASES._commentbundle: bundle = 2018.0317 | if left blank, need to provide via command line using -bundle option
CASES._commentstatus: status = in|app|new|(leave blank for defaul report section)
